channel.title: year-in-review on bananafish
channel.description: Recent content in year-in-review on bananafish

item.description: Twenty twenty-three will be the year I stop putting too much pressure on myself. 2023 is the year that I will do the things that I want to do in life. Last year was a year of great change and paralysis. It was the year in which I finished my undergraduate degree(s) and the question of what I truly wanted to do in the future stared me straight in the face.

item.title: 2021 in Review // Hopes for 2022
item.description: What better way to start off the new year than to review last year? - Sebastian Lau, actually 2022 (actually 2021) Part 1: 2021 in Review Year of Stanisław Lem The year of 2021 is declared the Year of Stanisław Lem in Poland, according to the November 27, 2020 resolution of Sejm (the lower house of the parliament of Poland). [...] 2021 is the year of the 100th Stanisław Lem anniversary.

item.title: A New Year 2021
